result.emptyState: Use RUN {cmdOrCtrl}⏎ to execute your SQL query.

downloadDialog.warning: ⚠️ Auto increment is not yet supported (and maybe some other stuff), but feel free to contribute.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.description: Create a simple definitions table with words and their definition.

miniBlog.title: Mini blog
miniBlog.description: Create tables to handle blog articles and their related comments.

miniBlogSeed.title: Mini blog (seed)
miniBlogSeed.description: Add 10 articles and 10 related comments. Tables articles and comments must be created with Mini blog snippet to work properly.

listTables.title: List tables
listTables.description: List all tables in your database.

miniShop.title: Mini shop
miniShop.description: Create tables products and customers with a customers_products joining table to track bought products.
